movie_title: English Rewind - Entertainment: A night at the theatre üé≠
introduction: Do you like the theatre? üé≠ Do you want to learn more English words to help you talk about your love

vocabulary.example: It's such a pleasurable experience to watch live theatre performances.

vocabulary.definition: a conversation between two people, specifically in a theatrical setting
vocabulary.example: The dualog between the actors and the audience created an engaging atmosphere in the theatre.

vocabulary.definition: when only one person speaks on stage
vocabulary.example: The actor delivered a powerful monologue that captivated the audience.

vocabulary.definition: all tickets for an event or performance have been sold
vocabulary.example: I went to buy a ticket for the show, but unfortunately, it was sold out.

vocabulary.definition: to draw in or pull towards oneself
vocabulary.example: Musicals attract a wide social group of people who come to enjoy the performance.

vocabulary.definition: relating to the theatre or acting
vocabulary.example: Her theatrical skills were evident in the way she portrayed the character on stage.
